name: Anuuu
greetingText: I'm so grateful to have met the most beautiful you in the most beautiful years
wishText: May your beauty last forever, like flowers on your head, year after year. May your youth never fade, and every year brings joy.
textInChatBox: Very very very sincerely wishing you a happy birthdayy!!! Lots and lots of happiness...
text2: I want to give you a surprise
text3: I thought about it seriously for a long time
text4: I realized, I wanted to do something
text5Content: You are very special to me
outroText: I hope you like this little surprise! Do i deserve a hug? :)
replayText: If you liked it, you can watch it again! Or...
